subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: In a tense game with frequent grappling and sneering after the whistle, Tom Brady led a rally with help from a receiver’s pass in New England’s win over Baltimore in the divisional playoff game.
snippet: In a tense game with frequent grappling and sneering after the whistle, Tom Brady led a rally with help from a receiver’s pass in New England’s win over Baltimore in the divisional playoff game.
